mapper.select: SELECT to_char(sbzt)||','||to_char(sl) "sl" FROM (SELECT sbzt , to_char(count(*)) sl FROM (SELECT case when sbzt = '在线' then 'sxtzx' else 'sxtlx' end AS sbzt FROM zhsq_sxt) GROUP BY sbzt) UNION SELECT to_char(sbzt)||','||to_char(sl) "sl" FROM (SELECT sbzt , to_char(count(*)) sl FROM (SELECT case when sbzt = '在线' then 'ygzx' else 'yglx' end AS sbzt FROM zhsq_yg) GROUP BY sbzt) UNION SELECT to_char(sbzt)||','||to_char(sl) "sl" FROM (SELECT sbzt , to_char(count(*)) sl FROM (SELECT case when sbzt = '在线' then 'zjzx' else 'zjlx' end AS sbzt FROM zhsq_zj) GROUP BY sbzt)

SELECT concat( concat( 'total', ',' ), sl ) "sl" FROM ( SELECT count( jmid ) sl FROM zhsq_jm ) UNION SELECT concat( concat( 'czrs', ',' ), sl ) "sl" FROM ( SELECT count( jmid ) sl FROM zhsq_jm WHERE sfcz = #{ czrk } ) UNION SELECT concat( concat( 'ldrs', ',' ), sl ) "sl" FROM ( SELECT count( jmid ) sl FROM zhsq_jm WHERE sfcz = #{ wlrk } )
SELECT concat( concat( 'dzz', ',' ), sl ) "sl" FROM ( SELECT count( dzzid ) sl FROM zhsq_dzz ) UNION SELECT concat( concat( 'dy', ',' ), sl ) "sl" FROM ( SELECT count( dyid ) sl FROM zhsq_dy )

SELECT to_char(count( * )) "sl", xl "keys" FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN xl = '大专' THEN '大专' WHEN xl = '本科' THEN '本科' WHEN xl = '硕士' THEN '硕士' WHEN xl = '博士' THEN '博士' WHEN xl = '高中' THEN '高中' ELSE '高中以下' END AS xl FROM zhsq_dy ) GROUP BY xl

SELECT nl "keys", to_char(count(*)) "sl" FROM (SELECT case when to_number(nl) < 20 then '20以下' when to_number(nl) >= 20 and to_number(nl) <= 30 then '20-30' when to_number(nl) > 30 and to_number(nl) <= 40 then '31-40' when to_number(nl) > 40 and to_number(nl) <= 50 then '41-50' when to_number(nl) > 50 and to_number(nl) <= 60 then '51-60' else '60以上' end AS nl FROM zhsq_dy) GROUP BY nl
SELECT xb "keys", to_char( count( * )) "sl" FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN xb = '男' THEN '男' ELSE '女' END AS xb FROM zhsq_dy ) GROUP BY xb

SELECT to_char(count( * )) "sl", mz "keys" FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN mz = '汉族' THEN '汉族' WHEN mz = '回族' THEN '回族' WHEN mz = '苗族' THEN '苗族' WHEN mz = '土家族' THEN '土家族' WHEN mz = '藏族' THEN '藏族' ELSE '其他' END AS mz FROM zhsq_dy ) GROUP BY mz
